```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
# Load the data
enrollment <- read_excel("raw_data/class_enrollment_summary_by_term_2-10-2021.xlsx", 
                         skip = 3)

# Data cleaning
enrollment <- enrollment %>% 
  clean_names()

enrollment %>% 
  select(course_name, total) %>% 
  group_by(course_name) %>% 
  summarize(sum_total = sum(total)) %>% 
  arrange(desc(sum_total)) %>% 
  slice(1:10) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = fct_reorder(course_name,
                             sum_total),
             y = sum_total)) +
  geom_col()

enrollment %>% 
  filter(course_name == "expos")
```
